NSMutableURLRequest  assumesHTTP3Capable Instance PropertyassumesHTTP3CapableiOS 14.5+iPadOS 14.5+Mac Catalyst 14.5+macOS 11.3+tvOS 14.5+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 7.4+var assumesHTTP3Capable: Bool { get set }Return ValueYES if server endpoint is known to support HTTP/3. Defaults to NO. The default may be YES in a future OS update.

Returns whether we assume that server supports HTTP/3. Enables QUIC racing without HTTP/3 service discovery.

# assumesHTTP3Capable | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Foundation ](/documentation/foundation)

- [ NSMutableURLRequest ](/documentation/foundation/nsmutableurlrequest)

- [ assumesHTTP3Capable ](/documentation/Foundation/NSMutableURLRequest/assumesHTTP3Capable)

- [ NSMutableURLRequest ](/documentation/foundation/nsmutableurlrequest)

-  assumesHTTP3Capable 

Instance Property# assumesHTTP3Capable

iOS 14.5+iPadOS 14.5+Mac Catalyst 14.5+macOS 11.3+tvOS 14.5+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 7.4+

```
var assumesHTTP3Capable: Bool { get set }
```

## [Return Value](/documentation/Foundation/NSMutableURLRequest/assumesHTTP3Capable#return-value)

YES if server endpoint is known to support HTTP/3. Defaults to NO. The default may be YES in a future OS update.

## [Discussion](/documentation/Foundation/NSMutableURLRequest/assumesHTTP3Capable#discussion)

Returns whether we assume that server supports HTTP/3. Enables QUIC racing without HTTP/3 service discovery.
